about: Hi! I'm Fabian. I'm a software developer, technical sound designer, composer, and recording musician. From integrating music & audio into games, composing music and design sfx, to building web & software apps.
I'm passionate about combining my passions of audio & technology. I have developed solo small games, and collaborated in game jams as a technical sound designer, audio implementer, & composer.

responsibilities: Update & maintain multiple sites in the front end with Javascript, ISML & CSS in responsive design
Build custom components for Salesforce Commerce Cloud Page Designer in Javascript
Write technical documentation for non-developers on custom components for Page Designer
Work in Agile 2-week sprint, using Jira for task management, & Azure DevOps for version control
Develop games in Unity, Unreal Engine, and Godot, with emphasis on audio production
Build full stack or frontend music web apps with React & Node.js
Create & sell audio plugin in Kontakt for musicians to use in their music
Arrange & record live instruments for collaborative albums by video game community, GameGrooves
Compose music & design SFX for games

education.focus: 15-week intensive coding bootcamp in Software Engineering

games.name: Ningning na Diyosa
games.description: Play as Tala, a light goddess who must fend off against Filipino mythical creatures in space using her light orbs.

games.name: The Great Bleaching
games.description: You are Liko the Louse. Prophecy foretells of 'The Great Bleaching', a cataclysmic event that occurs when the roots of the hair are a different color, as tall as a louse house. Embark on an epic quest to save your village from uncertain doom.

games.name: Maliksi
games.description: Play as Malik, an Eskrimador who must fight through Filipino-inspired mythological creature bosses for her to retrieve the stolen light that protects the village.

games.name: Multo ilaw
games.description: Play as Multo, where you must bring a light to a village in order to ward off the evil spirits.

games.name: Ritsu & Mochi
games.description: Follow Ritsu the young robotics engineer and MOCHI, his trusty robot as they explore an abandoned robot factory.

games.name: Night of the Lesbian Vampires
games.role: Composer, Sound Designer, Dialogue Audio Editor
games.description: Go on a date with one of the vampires and maybe it will change your life!

games.name: DIY or Die
games.description: Your old patched up car is finally giving out while you're on a road trip. Quickly use some spare parts from your car and patch them up while driving! Repair and Craft your way to the nearest pitstop or die stranded in the desert with no help.

games.name: Death by Debt
games.description: Death by Debt is a gay dating sim created for Nanoreno2020.

games.name: Sidetracked!
games.description: A visual novel about getting one thing done in the course of a day.

games.name: Pathfinder: Last Stand
games.description: A survival based arcade game, where you must fend off many enemies that hide in the shadows.

games.name: OshaCoaster
games.description: OSHA Coaster lets you live out your dreams of inflicting inflicting as much pain and suffering to allow you cash in on that sweet medical bill money.

projects.name: Saranay VST
projects.description: Kontakt VST instrument of the Saranay, a Filipino traditional instrument.

projects.name: Learn Filipino Rondalla
projects.description: An educational site to learn about Filipino Rondalla, a traditional music style from the Philippines. It is a resource for composers and arrangers to get started in scoring for Rondalla instruments for their music.

projects.name: Polar Patterns
projects.description: A web app to show the different polar patterns for microphone recording.

projects.name: Ergo Argot
projects.description: A small mobile app. Search for a word, phrase, acronym from internet slang and receive the first definition result of it based on the Urban Dictionary API.

projects.name: Music Leftovers
projects.description: A mock E-Commerce shop of used music gear.
